ISSUE.TITLE: There should be Nepal in border countries of China
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If you try to fetch border countries of Nepal then there is China and India. If you fetch borders of India then there is Nepal too but when you fetch borders of China then there is not Nepal which there must be.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: PR #263 Updating Swaziland Country Name Fixing #249

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Added Nepal as border to China Fixing https://github.com/apilayer/restcountries/issues/237
